column4: It's part of "notification area" applet.  Add that to your panel.
and how can i add it?
Right click on your panel.  Add to panel.
sorry but i don't find the icon, it appears many others but not the wifi one
the wifi icon is part of the notification area.  You added the notification area and the network icon didn't show up?
Fixed it then?
yes, i didn't read you appropiatelly
Excellent :)
one more question, i try to suspend my laptop

Yeah, that's hard to program for linux developers because there is so much left up to the hardware vendors.  There is little advice I can give to fix
